amendment.description: To provide a complete substitute for the preamble.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4070 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4070 proposed by Senator Craig for Senator Campbell. (consideration: CR S11584; text: CR S11584) To provide a complete substitute for the preamble.
